0.name: Gravity Suppression
0.fullDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Welt's ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Edge of the Void
0.fullDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Welt's ATK to a single enemy and further deals DMG 2 extra times, with each time dealing Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Welt's ATK to a random enemy. On hit, there is a <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> <u>base chance</u> to reduce the enemy's SPD by {{3}}% for {{4}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy. This attack can Bounce 3 times, with a chance of <color=#f29e38ff>Slowing</color> the hit enemies.

0.name: Synthetic Black Hole
0.fullDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1}}%</orangeStrong> of Welt's ATK to all enemies, with a {{3}}% <u>base chance</u> for enemies hit by this ability to be Imprisoned for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by <orangeStrong>{{2}}%</orangeStrong> and SPD reduced by {{4}}%.
0.shortDesc: Deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, with <color=#f29e38ff>a high chance of Imprisoning them</color>.

0.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
0.fullDesc: After using Welt's Technique, create a dimension that lasts for {{4}} second(s). Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced by {{5}}%. After entering battle with enemies in the dimension, there is a {{1}}% <u>base chance</u> to Imprison the enemies for 1 turn.\nImprisoned enemies have their <u>actions delayed</u> by {{2}}% and SPD reduced by {{3}}%. Only 1 dimension created by allies can exist at the same time.
0.shortDesc: Creates a dimension. Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, there is a <color=#f29e38ff>high chance for the enemies to become Imprisoned</color>.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
